testCase.requirementText: A value from the METS-standard which identifies the algorithm used to calculate the checksum for the referenced file.
testCase.description: This requirement already exists in the METS-standard, but it is optional, so a test is required to check the attribute exists and that its value is from the valid vocabulary.

error.message: the mdRef element has no @CHECKSUMTYPE attribute, each mets/dmdSec/mdRef/ element must use the @CHECKSUMTYPE attribute.

package.name: IP_CSIP30_1_A_NoChecksumtype
package.description: Minimal package, contains a file, a descriptive metadata document and a METS document with an mdRef element referencing the metadata file. The mdRef has a checksum, but no @CHECKSUMTYPE attribute for the referenced metadata file.

package.name: IP_CSIP30_1_B_Checksumtype
package.description: Minimal package, contains a file, a descriptive metadata document and a METS document with an mdRef element referencing the metadata file. The mdRef has a checksum and @CHECKSUMTYPE attribute for the referenced metadata file .

rule.description: The mets/dmdSec/mdRef/@CHECKSUMTYPE value is not from the METS-standard

error.message: the mdRef element @CHECKSUMTYPE value is not from the valid METS-standard vocabulary. The @CHECKSUMTYPE attribute must identify the algorithm used to calculate the checksum for the referenced file from the following values: Adler-32 CRC32 HAVAL MD5 MNP SHA-1 SHA-256 SHA-384 SHA-512 TIGER WHIRLPOOL

package.name: IP_CSIP30_2_A_InvalidChecksumType
package.description: Minimal package, contains a file, a descriptive metadata document and a METS document with an mdRef element referencing the metadata file. The mdRef has a checksum and @CHECKSUMTYPE attribute for the referenced metada file with the CHECKSUMTYPE value "Test"

package.name: IP_CSIP30_2_B_ValidChecksumType
package.description: Minimal package, contains a file, a descriptive metadata document and a METS document with an mdRef element referencing the metadata file. The mdRef has a checksum and @CHECKSUMTYPE attribute for the referenced metada file with the CHECKSUMTYPE value "MD5"
